DOC.HEADLINE: ISRAELI , PLO LEADERS AND CHRISTOPHER TO MEET IN NORWAY
DOC.TEXT: Norway will host talks this weekend between Israeli and Palestinian leaders along with U.S. Secretary_of_State Warren Christopher , the national news_agency NTB reported Thursday . Palestine Liberation Organization Chairman Yasser Arafat and Israeli Foreign Minister Shimon Peres are to be in Oslo to attend the funeral of Norwegian Foreign Minister Johan Jorgen Holst , who helped broker the historic Middle_East peace accord . NTB said the talks will probably start tonight and be led by Norway ' s acting foreign_minister , Bjoern Tore Godal . Christopher plans to hold separate meetings with Peres and Arafat on Saturday before attending a memorial service for the Norwegian foreign_minister . Egyptian Foreign Minister Amir Moussa said in Cairo that Arafat and Peres will hold talks in Norway on Saturday , trying to put_back on track Israel ' s delayed withdrawal from Gaza and Jericho .
